description: Implement virtualization for large song lists and recommendation results
steps: Install react-window or @tanstack/react-virtual for virtualizing long lists
Identify list components: PlaylistCard, ArtistsList, playlist-list.tsx, recommendation results that render 100+ items
Refactor list rendering to use windowing: only render visible items and a few buffer items above/below viewport
Update library-index.ts to return paginated results (max 50 items per page) instead of all 1500 songs
Test with large libraries (500+ songs) to verify smooth scrolling and reduced memory usage
